summary: Dr. Diego Escobosa was disciplined for unprofessional conduct, including prescribing controlled dangerous substances to himself and family members, failing to maintain adequate medical records, and not meeting appropriate standards for patient care related to CDS prescriptions. He received a reprimand, a 30-day license suspension, and a minimum two-year probation with conditions including a $10,000 civil fine, enrollment in a rehabilitation program, and specific courses.
